document_data.name: Stone-Cold Reavers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stone-Cold Reavers''' were a group of reckless adventurers led by [[Syleen Wintermoon]] in the [[Sword Coast North]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. When there were suitable jobs, they made their living as sellswords. However, when honest work was unavailable, they turned to criminal activities, resorting to brigandry and thievery.
document_data.History: The group tried to steal the presumed treasure hoard of the young [[white dragon]] [[Cryovain]] from its lair, [[Icespire Hold]]. They waited for the dragon to leave its lair so they could raid it in its absence. However, Cryovain hadn't amassed any treasure yet.
document_data.Members:
*[[Syleen Wintermoon]]
*[[Runa Vokdottir]]
*[[Brakkis Elspaar]]
*[[Jabarl|Jabarl the Orc-Biter]]
*[[Dobin Noreth]]
